While exploring, when you are leading and allies are [Following the Expert](/Actions.aspx?ID=2625), instead of granting a +2 circumstance bonus in the applicable skill, you grant a +3 circumstance bonus if you're an expert and a +4 circumstance bonus if you're a master.
